text:
Marina Abramovic — performance artist

In 1974 she performed Rhythm 0. A piece where she stood still & allowed people to do as they pleased. Some gave her roses, some cut her clothes off, some moved her, one pointed a gun to her. Truly shows what people are and what people can be https://t.co/shZVi8lucv
